Package index

Functions

R functions of the throne package

rnp_flights_data()
Read and process flights data
rnp_otms_data()
Read and process OTM data
gen_otm_splines()
Generate OTM splines
correct_flights_data()
Correct flights data
match_data()
Match flights to OTM data
predict_thermal_landscape()
Predict thermal landscape

Datasets

Datasets used in the throne package

Example datasets

Datasets used as part of the examples in the package and in the validation of method

flights_metadata
Metadata for example flights
flights_data
Example flights data
otms_metadata
Metadata for example OTMs
otms_data
Example OTMs data
otms_splines
Example OTM splines nested data
matches_5
Matches data with error_max = 5

Case study datasets

Datasets used in the case study

Other datasets

Miscellaneous datasets used in the vignettes

correction_data
Correction data set for documentation
matches_20
Matches data with error_max = 20
elevation
Elevation profile of the area where we conducted the project at a spatial resolution of ~ 1m^2
bad_read_otm
OTM raw data file read incorrectly
good_read_otm
OTM raw data file read correctly
